segments.text: From where I'm standing, I can see the whole kitchen scene.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is busy with her plate and towel.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water is running from the faucet into the full sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's overflowing steadily onto the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: What a sloppy mess; the puddle is growing fast.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's not even glancing down at it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: To the left, the boy's on that unstable stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His reach into the cookie jar is precarious.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl has her hand out, expectant.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're being so naughty, sneaking cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It reminds me of my own childhood mischief.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The window frames a serene garden view.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Birds might be chirping out there, unaware.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder how long until someone notices the chaos.
segments.speaker: PAR
